title: EduChat
description: A real-time chat app for classrooms with secure logins, class-specific rooms, and instant text or image sharing.

title: BalanceBuddy
description: A personal finance tracker with real-time balance, simple +/- amount description input, editable and deletable transactions, and clear income/expense indicators.

title: Markdown Preview
description: A live markdown editor that converts text input into formatted HTML in real time for seamless writing and previewing.

title: Pomodoro Clock:
description: A customizable Pomodoro-style timer designed to boost productivity by alternating work and break intervals.

title: Huffman Compressor
description: A C++ file compressor that uses Huffman coding to efficiently reduce file sizes while maintaining data integrity.
